description: Deletes specific nodes within a SageMaker HyperPod cluster. BatchDeleteClusterNodes accepts a cluster name and a list of node IDs.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster from which to delete the specified nodes.

parameters.name: NodeIds
parameters.description: A list of node IDs to be deleted from the specified cluster. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Failed
nested_items.description: A list of errors encountered when deleting the specified nodes.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the error encountered when deleting a node.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message describing the error encountered when deleting a node.

nested_items.name: NodeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the node that encountered an error during the deletion process.

nested_items.name: Successful
nested_items.description: A list of node IDs that were successfully deleted from the specified cluster.
